MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:10PM to safely carry out repair work on our electrical equipment near to Mayfield substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:56 PM on Wednesday, 18 November 2020.
